definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: This high frequency alternating current produces the high frequency radio waves mentioned in the previous chapter.
sentences.chinese: 這種高頻交流電流產生前一章提到過的高頻無線電波。

sentences.english: Cellphones use ultra-high-frequency radio waves to connect with telecommunications networks.
sentences.chinese: 手機利用超高頻無線電波與通訊網絡取得聯繫。

sentences.english: It is a bit like radiowaves coding different radio stations at different frequency bands.
sentences.chinese: 這有點像無線電波在不同的頻段接收不同的廣播電臺。

sentences.english: They use the radio waves to talk, but the signals don't come from them.
sentences.chinese: 它們是用無線電波交談，不過那些信號並不來自它們。

sentences.english: You can't touch a radio wave.
This range of wavelengths falls into the radio part of the electromagnetic spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 這個範圍的波長落在電磁波譜上的無線電波段。

sentences.english: If the array picks up radio waves, then what do we do?
sentences.chinese: 如果望遠鏡陣收到了無線電波，那我們做什麼？

sentences.english: And interestingly enough, you can't hear radio waves.
sentences.chinese: 更有意思的是，你也聽不見無線電波。

sentences.english: Transmitters emit waves of a certain frequency in the direction of the target.
sentences.chinese: 發射器朝目標方向發射一定頻率的無線電波。

sentences.english: Microwave ovens emit very-high-frequency radio waves which penetrate the food instantly.
sentences.chinese: 微波爐會發出很高頻率的無線電波，立即穿透食物。
無線電波可以檢測的到。

sentences.english: The clouds were being affected by the two sets of radiowaves.
sentences.chinese: 雲層是被兩組無線電波所影響。

sentences.english: The device would be interfering with shorter-wavelength radio waves used for communication on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 該裝置會干擾地球上用於通訊的短波無線電波。

sentences.english: All mobile phones may be subject to radio interference which may affect their performance.
sentences.chinese: 所有手機都可能因受無線電波的干擾而影響通話質量。

sentences.english: However, radio waves attenuate as they move out from the transmitting antenna .
sentences.chinese: 然而，無線電波隨者從傳送的天線向外移動而衰減。

sentences.english: To control radiowaves, you can use copper and fibreglass.
sentences.chinese: 爲了控制無線電波，可採用銅和玻璃纖維。

definition: harmonic (wave with frequency an integer multiple of the fundamental)
